amendatorysection.para: Real property appraiser means a person (1) who engages in real property appraisal activity, (2) who advertises or holds himself or herself out to the general public as a real property appraiser, or (3) who offers, attempts, or agrees to perform or performs real property appraisal activity. Real property appraiser includes persons defined as real estate appraisers prior to July 14, 2006.
